Verses: 1 en Aaththumaave, Karththarai Sthoththiri; En Dhevanaagiya Karththaave, Neer Migavum Periyavaraayirukkireer; Magimaiyaiyum Magaththuvaththaiyum Anindhukondirukkireer.
2 oliyai Vasthiramaaga Thariththu, Vaanangalai Thiraiyaippol Viriththirukkireer.
3 thamadhu Melveedugalai Thanneergalaal Machchuppaavi, Megangalai Thamadhu Radhamaakki, Kaatrinudaiya Settaigalinmel Sellugiraar.
4  Thammudaiya Thoodhargalai Kaatrugalaagavum, Thammudaiya Oozhiyakkaararai Akkinijuvaalaigalaagavum Seygiraar.
5 boomi Orupodhum Nilaiperaadhapadi Adhin Aadhaarangalmel Adhai Sthaabiththaar.
6 adhai Vasthiraththinaal Mooduvadhupola Aazhaththinaal Moodineer; Parvadhangalinmel Thanneergal Nindradhu.
7 avaigal Umadhu Kandidhaththaal Vilagiyodi, Umadhu Kumuralin Saththaththaal Viraindhupoyitru.
8 avaigal Malaigalil Eri, Pallaththaakkugalil Irangi, Neer Avaigalukku Erpaduththina Idaththil Sendradhu.
9 avaigal Thirumbavum Vandhu Boomiyai Moodikkollaadhapadi Kadavaadhirukkum Ellaiyai Avaigalukku Erpaduththineer.
10 avar Pallaththaakkugalil Neerootrugalai Varavidugiraar; Avaigal Malaigal Naduve Odugiradhu.
11 avaigal Veliyin Jeevangalukkellaam Thanneer Kodukkum; Ange Kaattukkazhudhaigal Thangal Thaagaththai Theerththukkollum.
12 avaigalin Oramaai Aagaayaththupparavaigal Sanjariththu, Kilaigalmelirundhu Paadum.
13 thammudaiya Melveedugalilirundhu Parvadhangalukku Thanneer Iraikkiraar; Umadhu Kiriyaigalin Balanaale Boomi Thirupthiyaayirukkiradhu.
14 boomiyilirundhu Aagaaram Undaagumpadi, Avar Mirugangalukku Pullaiyum, Manusharukku Ubayogamaana Payirvagaigalaiyum Mulaippikkiraar.
15 manushanudaiya Irudhayaththai Magizhchchiyaakkum Thiraatcharasaththaiyum, Avanukku Mugakkalaiyai Undupannum Ennayaiyum, Manushanudaiya Irudhayaththai Aadharikkum Aagaaraththaiyum Vilaivikkiraar.
16 karththarudaiya Virutchangalum, Avar Naattina Leebanonin Kedhurukkalum Saaraththinaal Niraindhirukkum.
17 ange Kuruvigal Koodukattum; Dhevadhaaruvirutchangal Kokkugalin Kudiyiruppu.
18 uyarndha Parvadhangal Varaiyaadugalukkum, Kanmalaigal Kuzhimusalgalukkum Adaikkalam.
19 sandhiranai Kaalakkurippugalukkaaga Padaiththaar; Sooriyan Than Asthamanaththai Ariyum.
20 neer Irulai Kattalaiyidugireer, Raakkaalamaagum; Adhile Sagala Kaattu Jeevangalum Nadamaadum.
21 baalasingangal Iraikkaaga Kerchchiththu, Dhevanaal Thangalukku Aagaaram Kidaikkumpadi Thedum.
22 sooriyan Udhikkaiyil Avaigal Odhungi, Thangal Thaabarangalil Paduththukkollum.
23 appozhudhu Manushan Saayangaalamattum Than Velaikkum, Than Pannaikkum Purappadugiraan.
24 karththaave, Umadhu Kiriyaigal Evvalavu Thiralaayirukkiradhu! Avaigalaiyellaam Gnaanamaai Padaiththeer; Boomi Ummudaiya Porulgalinaal Niraindhirukkiradhu.
25 peridhum Visthaaramumaana Indha Samuththiramum Appadiye Niraindhirukkiradhu; Adhile Sanjarikkum Siriyavaigalum Periyavaigalumaana Ennirandha Jeevangal Undu.
26 adhile Kappalgal Odum; Adhile Vilaiyaadumpadi Neer Undaakkina Thimingilangalum Undu.
27 etravelaiyil Aagaaraththai Tharuveer Endru Avaigalellaam Ummai Nokki Kaaththirukkum.
28 neer Kodukka, Avaigal Vaangikkollum; Neer Ummudaiya Kaiyaiththirakka, Avaigal Nanmaiyaal Thirupdhiyaagum.
29 neer Umadhu Mugaththai Maraikka, Thigaikkum; Neer Avaigalin Suvaasaththai Vaangikkolla, Avaigal Maandu, Thangal Mannukku Thirumbum.
30 neer Ummudaiya Aaviyai Anuppumbodhu, Avaigal Sirushtikkappadum; Neer Boomiyin Roobaththaiyum Pudhidhaakkugireer.
31 karththarudaiya Magimai Endrendraikkum Vilangum; Karththar Thammudaiya Kiriyaigalile Magizhuvaar.
32 avar Boomiyai Nokkippaarkka, Adhu Adhirum; Avar Parvadhangalaiththoda, Avaigal Pugaiyum.
33 naan Uyirodirukkumattum En Karththarai Paaduven; Naan Ullalavum En Dhevanai Keerththanampannuven.
34 naan Avarai Dhiyaanikkum Dhiyaanam Inidhaayirukkum; Naan Karththarukkul Magizhuven.
35 paavigal Boomiyilirundhu Nirmoolamaagi, Thunmaarkkar Ini Iraamarpovaargal. En Aaththumaave, Karththarai Sthoththiri, Allelooyaa
